Text.Page:
Elleon, our colleagues, and I have put weeks of work into exposing the Atel Akaad's plot.
Today, we finally see the fruits of our efforts.
(Cultists' Refuge is a 5-person dungeon and will advance related quests.
(Cultists' Refuge (Solo) is 1-person dungeon, but will not advance any quests.)
Use Teleportal.Go to Cultists' Refuge.
